LIVEKITAVCLIENT.connectErrorCheckClock: A secure token could not be created. Please check the date & time on your computer to ensure that they are set accurately
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.connectionInfoMissing: LiveKit connection information missing; please provide a Server Address, API Key, and Secret
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.audioMusicModeHint: Configures audio input for music streaming by adjusting bitrate and disabling echo cancelation & noise suppression. This should not be used for normal voice communication.
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.audioMusicModeRateHint: The bitrate used for audio when Music Mode is enabled. Increasing this will affect bandwidth and resource requirements on all clients.
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.debugHint: Enables CONFIG.debug.av and CONFIG.debug.avclient for extra logging
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.disableReceivingAudioHin: Don't subscribe to other users' audio tracks
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.disableReceivingAudioWar: Receiving audio is disabled in LiveKit AVClient Module Settings
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.disableReceivingVideoHin: Don't subscribe to other users' video tracks. May be helpful if your bandwidth or CPU is limited
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.disableReceivingVideoWar: Receiving video is disabled in LiveKit AVClient Module Settings
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.displayConnectionQuality: Display a connection quality indicator beside each player's name to show the quality of their connection to the LiveKit server
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.liveKitTraceHint: Enables trace logging of the LiveKit client library
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.resetRoomHint: Reset the meeting room ID used for your A/V
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.serverDetailsTavern: Subscribe to the At the Tavern Patreon
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.simulcastHint: Use simulcast video tracks with LiveKit. This may help low-resource clients and the expense of some video tracks not being sent or received by them
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.tokenError: Could not generate LiveKit access token; check your A/V Server settings
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.useExternalAVHint: (Experimental) Opens a LiveKit web client for A/V in separate browser window
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.externalAVJoinMessage: Join A/V with LiveKit web client?
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.tavernAccountLogoutError: Error signing out of Patreon account
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.tavernAccountPatreonHint: Sign in with your Patreon account to access the Tavern LiveKit cluster
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.tavernAccountTokenHint: Paste the token provided after signing in with Patreon
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.tavernAccountMissing: LiveKit connection information missing; please sign in to your Patreon account with access to the Tavern LiveKit cluster
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.patreonAccountError: Error getting account; please sign out and try again
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.WarningCannotBroadcastUs: You cannot enable the user's camera because they to not have permission to broadcast their video feed.
You cannot enable the user's microphone because they to not have permission to broadcast their audio feed.
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.WarningCannotEnableUserV: You cannot enable the user's camera because they have hidden themselves.
LIVEKITAVCLIENT.WarningCannotEnableUserA: You cannot enable the user's microphone because they have muted themselves.
